profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-10-12 12:34:21 -0400.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: There is no Deed of Gift for this collection.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: In 2014, the tapes were digitized and in 2017 the collection was reprocessed. Audio recordings were organized and boxed for long term storage. There are no relases or adminstrative files for this collection.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The D.C. Public Library does not hold copyright. It is the responsibility of the researcher to obtain permission to publish or exhibit information. Reproduction of oral Histories without release is not permitted.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Materials in this series include master of the oral histories on audio cassette. There are duplicate copies of 23-22 and 23-23.
